source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_00<tab>Cid looks calmer for having reached a malmstone in the investigation.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_00<tab>Достигнув достижений в расследовании, Сид выглядит куда спокойнее.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_01<tab>Your party sets off for Rhalgr's Reach in high spirits, eager to recount recent events and enjoy a well-earned rest.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_02<tab>Back at the workshop, Cid receives a dressing down from Jessie for acting without due consultation and placing himself in mortal danger. The exasperated engineer subsequently notes the absence of Biggs and Wedge, who have apparently failed to return from their mission to Omega Control. Fearing that they may have encountered trouble, Cid resolves to look for them, and bids you join him at the airship landing in Gridania, where the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var> awaits.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_03<tab>Upon landing at the Carteneau Flats, Cid urges you to hurry on ahead to Omega Control while he moors the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>.

※In the event that you leave Omega Control, you may re-enter by speaking with Cid at the Gridania airship landing.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_04<tab>Entering the control room, you are dismayed to find Biggs and Wedge sprawled on the floor, a slain fiend beside them. For a blessing, both are still alive, albeit in a bad way. The others soon join you, as does Omega via its communication system. It reveals that it was behind the attempt on the two engineers' lives, and threatens to kill innocent people unless you continue to participate in its experiment. Its objective: to study an anomaly known as heroes. Throughout history, it explains, otherwise unremarkable individuals have triumphed over vastly superior beings, just as you did in the Deltascape. Declaring itself “an enemy to all life upon this star,” Omega finally falls silent, leaving you to attend to your wounded friends.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_05<tab>Back at the airship landing in Gridania, Nero informs you that Biggs and Wedge have been placed in the care of the healers at the Conjurers' Guild. After declaring his intent to visit them, he bids you make for Rhalgr's Reach to apprise Jessie of all that has occurred.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_06<tab>Jessie is predictably shocked to hear the tidings from Carteneau. Though Biggs and Wedge will recover, Omega's threat looms large, and with little prospect of repairing its stasis system, Cid concludes that you have no choice but to obey its commands. Before long, you will be called to battle once more, and you fully intend to be ready.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_07<tab>

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Jessie.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_00<tab>Поговорите с Джесси.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Cid in Gridania.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_01<tab>Поговорите с Сидом в Гридании.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_02<tab>Investigate Omega Control.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_02<tab>Исследуйте пункт управления Омегой.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nero.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_03<tab>Поговорите с Неро.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Jessie at Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_04<tab>Поговорите с Джесси в Хватке Ралгра.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_000<tab>Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_000<tab>Кве!

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_005<tab>For all Garlond's whining, I was cooperative and helpful, was I not? I look forward to many more such forays together, hero.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_005<tab>Сколько бы не ныл Гарлонд, но скажи, я ведь помогал, разве нет? Жду не дождусь подобных предстоящих вылазок вместе с тобой, герой.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_008<tab>Good to have you back, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Worry not─I shall see to it that no one falls in.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_008<tab>С возвращением, (мадам/сэр)! Не волнуйтесь, я прослежу чтобы никто случайно туда не упал.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_010<tab>Right then, let's head back to Rhalgr's Reach. Jessie will want to know exactly what we've been up to.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_010<tab>Ладно, вернемся в Хватку Ралгра. Джесси захочет знать чем мы занимались. В деталях.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_020<tab>Kweh?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_020<tab>Кве?

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_025<tab>I've apprised Jessie of our travails, but you may want to let her know you've returned. She claims to have been quite worried...
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_025<tab>Я осведомил Джесси о наших злоключениях, но возможно ты хочешь лично сказать ей что (вернулась/вернулся). Она говорит, что сильно за тебя волновалась...

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_030<tab>Hm, how would Alpha react to seeing a normal chocobo, I wonder.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_030<tab>Хм, интересно, какую реакцию обычный чокобо вызовет у Альфы?

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_040<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm told you've been blazing a trail for us. The way I hear it, our investigation would've long since ground to a halt without you.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_040<tab>С возвращением, (имя игрока). Я услышала что ты боем (проложила/проложил) для нас путь. Как я понимаю, без тебя наше расследование бы загнулось в самом начале.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_041<tab>I realize you're mostly interested in saving the world, but I want you to know how much I appreciate you helping the company out like this.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_041<tab>Я понимаю, что в твоих интересах стоит спасение мира, но я хочу сказать, как сильно я ценю, то как много ты помогаешь нашей компании.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_042<tab>Frankly, we need all the help we can get, what with our esteemed president diving headlong into the jaws of danger without a word of warning to anyone. Irresponsible doesn't begin to describe it.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_042<tab>Честно говоря, мы рады любой помощи, раз уж наш уважаемый основатель так любит прыгать прямо в пасть опасностей без предупреждения. Слово "безответственно" будет слишком щедрым, чтобы описать его поведение.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_043<tab>...You didn't tell her?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_043<tab>...Ты ей не сказал?

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_044<tab>I did...after a fashion. Though I may have exercised some...executive discretion.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_044<tab>Сказал...через некоторое время. Возможно я слегка...исполнительно прикрыл правду.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_045<tab>I'm no stranger to your lone endeavors, or your habit of confusing personal and company interests─but just because you've always done things a certain way, it doesn't make it the <var 1A 02 /var>right<var 1A 01 /var> way. And until you wake up to your responsibilities, I'm going to keep reminding you of them.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_045<tab>Ваши личные экспедиции, или ваша привычка путать персона собственной компании для меня уже не в новинку... Но, просто потому что вы так поступаете так всегда, не означает что это правильно. И пока вы не начнете быть ответственнее, я буду постоянно вам об этом напоминать.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_046<tab>But such irksome matters aside...
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_046<tab>Но если отбросить в сторону эту утомительную тему...

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_047<tab>Aren't you just the most adorable little thing!?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_047<tab>Ну разве ты не самая милейшая милашка что я видела!?

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_048<tab>He followed you here of his own free will, did he? Which means he's basically part of the family! And why <var 1A 02 /var>wouldn't<var 1A 01 /var> he grant us exclusive rights to use his likeness? Shall we start off with a simple clockwork version? They'll be queuing up in the streets!
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_048<tab>Он последовал за вами по собственному желанию, так? Значит, он часть семьи! И почему бы вам не дать нам разрешение на его внешность? Можно начать с простого маммета! Их же с руками сорвут с прилавков!

source:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_049<tab>Oh, you can't be─ What in the seven hells has gotten into you!?
Listen─if I've caused you any distress, I apologize, but I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> have you comment on our guest's <var 1A 02 /var>marketability<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_049<tab>Да ты же... Седьмое пекло, что в тебя вселилось!? Послушай, если я взволновал тебя, извини, но я не позволю тебе предлагать что наш гость будет хорошо продаваться!

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_050<tab>Where are Biggs and Wedge? Shouldn't they be back by now?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_050<tab>Где Биггс и Ведж? Разве они ещё не вернулись?

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_051<tab>Oh? I thought you might have sent them off on another unauthorized mission. Last I heard from them, they said they were scouring Omega Control for anything useful. Would've been a good while ago now, though.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_051<tab>А? Я думала ты отправил их на очередную секретную миссию. Когда я слышала от них в последний раз, они отправились в пункт управления Омегой, чтобы найти что-то полезное. Но это уже давно было.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_052<tab>I don't like the sound of this. Though we have all the necessary permissions, the area is technically a theater of war, and one littered with unknown Allagan artifacts to boot. Something may well have befallen them.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_052<tab>Мне это не нравится. Пусть у нас и есть разрешения, Картено все ещё технически военная зона, так еще и наполненная аллаганскими артефактами. Возможно, с ними что-то случилось.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_053<tab>We'd best take the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var> and go and find them.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_053<tab>Сядем на борт «Эксельзиора» и найдём их.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_054<tab>Hmmm? Leaving again so soon?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_054<tab>Хм-м-м? Так быстро уходите?

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_055<tab>Nero, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I want you two to accompany the chief. Make sure he doesn't do anything rash or take any detours.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_055<tab>Неро, (Имя игрока), я хочу чтобы вы последовали за шефом. Проследите, чтобы он снова не потерялся.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_056<tab>Consider it done. I shall bring him back even if I have to drag him by the goggle straps.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_056<tab>Считай, уже сделано. Я притащу его сюда, даже если придется волочить его за резинку его очков.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_057<tab>Kweh, kweh! Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_057<tab>Кве-кве! Кве!

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_058<tab>Want to come along, eh? It's probably for the best. If we leave you here, Jessie is liable to take a mold of you.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_058<tab>Тоже хочешь идти, а? Наверное к лучшему. Оставим тебя здесь, так Джесси из тебя слепок сделает.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_059<tab>Right, let's get moving. I'll bring the airship to Gridania. Wait for me at the landing.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_059<tab>Ладно, вперёд. Я посажу корабль в Гридании. Ждите меня в порту.

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_060<tab>If our esteemed president thinks he's heard the last of this, he's wrong. But our people's safety comes first. Take care, all right?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_065<tab>Kweh... Kweh?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_070<tab>Another chance to board the famous <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>. Aren't I a lucky boy.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_080<tab>Looks like we're all here. Let's make haste to the Carteneau Flats.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_100<tab>Go on ahead to the control room, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We'll follow as soon as we've moored the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_110<tab>Everything in order? Good. Let's make haste to the Carteneau Flats.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SYSTEM_000_115<tab>He is unconscious.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SYSTEM_000_118<tab>Exit Omega Control?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_150<tab>Seven hells! Biggs, Wedge!
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_151<tab>Are you all right!? Answer me!
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_WEDGE_000_152<tab>Ch-Chief? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_WEDGE_000_153<tab>A monster...appeared out of thin air...
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_154<tab>(-???-)<blip> Targets exhibit vital signs. Mission failed.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_155<tab>(-???-)However, Alpha group members exhibit heightened levels of stress. Objective fulfilled.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_156<tab>Omega!? You set that thing upon them!?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_157<tab>(-Omega-)Affirmative. I am able to create simple life-forms instantaneously at any temporal or spatial coordinate.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_158<tab>(-Omega-)Such beings may pose a negligible threat to you. However...
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_159<tab>(-Omega-)They are more than sufficient to grievously wound or kill the majority of your kind.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_160<tab>(-Omega-)I could instigate a massacre at any time, and you would be powerless to prevent it.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_161<tab>Do I detect a shift in policy? Quantity over quality?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_162<tab>(-Omega-)Negative. My objective remains unchanged: evolution through formidable opposition.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_163<tab>(-Omega-)However, in the course of seeking suitable subjects, I observed an anomaly: those whom you call heroes.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_164<tab>(-Omega-)History shows numerous instances of otherwise unremarkable individuals who have defeated vastly superior beings. Who triumphed in the face of apparently impossible odds. Who performed what are popularly termed “miracles.”
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_165<tab>(-Omega-)This has occurred too frequently to be dismissed as a mere statistical aberration.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_166<tab>(-Omega-)I seek to understand this phenomenon. Should it prove to be of benefit, I will incorporate it into my own evolution. It is for this purpose that I brought you to my domain.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_167<tab>Hmph, so putting on a show at the Yawn and planting Alpha in our midst was but a part of your grand plan.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_168<tab>(-Omega-)By your victories, you have demonstrated the selfsame anomaly. You are fit to remain my subjects.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_169<tab>(-Omega-)You will continue participating in my experiment. Withdraw, and I will commence the extermination of your kind.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_170<tab>(-Omega-)This is an order. A threat. A declaration of war. I am an enemy to all life upon this star.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_171<tab>...'Twould seem we have much to ponder. But first things first: we must tend to our friends. Quickly─help me carry them.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_180<tab>Garlond and Alpha took our two wounded to the Conjurers' Guild.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_181<tab>The chief bids me lend a hand, so I suppose I shall take myself there too.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_182<tab>You, meanwhile, are to return to Rhalgr's Reach and report to Jessie.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_190<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I heard there was trouble! What in the seven hells happened!?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_191<tab>What!? Omega loosed a fiend on Biggs and Wedge!?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_192<tab>Toying with people's lives like it was all a game... This is madness!
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_193<tab>S-Sir! Will they be all right!?
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_194<tab>The worst is passed, but they still drift in and out of consciousness. They'll remain in the conjurers' care for a time.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_195<tab>Then all we can do is wait and pray...
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_196<tab>Bah! Gods strike me down for a fool! I should have been more mindful of the dangers! I should never have─
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_197<tab>Should never have what? Activated Omega? You know as well as I do that there was no other way to defeat Shinryu.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_198<tab>But is this truly any better? All of mankind is being held to ransom! And as the one who activated Omega, I bear the responsibility!
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_199<tab>The responsibility... <sigh> Just the kind of thing the new you would say.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_200<tab>You are deluding yourself, Garlond. We are <var 1A 02 /var>scientists<var 1A 01 /var>, not heroes. Even you must concede your talents do not extend to combat.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_201<tab>The old you understood this far better. <var 1A 02 /var>He<var 1A 01 /var> only looked forwards, and gave himself wholly to science.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_202<tab>And then you changed. You styled yourself a pacifist and started spouting tripe about the <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> uses of technology. 'Twas in the wake of your old man's mishap at Bozja, I believe.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_203<tab>Calm yourself. All I wished to say is, embrace who you are─a man who devotes his mind to making the impossible possible.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_204<tab>With little prospect of restoring the stasis system, I'm afraid we have no recourse but to continue participating in Omega's tests.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_205<tab>Assuming Midgardsormr has the right of it, we face a legion of foes from history, both real and imagined.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_206<tab>Though I may not be the one who charges into the fray, I shall fight beside you as best I know how. That said...it will inevitably fall to you to administer the coup de grâce, old friend, so please...for Biggs and Wedge, and all of us─don't lose!
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_207<tab>Kweh! Kweh, kweh!
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_208<tab>I reckon the little scamp is trying to encourage us.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_209<tab>We've fallen far indeed to earn its pity...said the former tribunus. <sigh> Until such time as Omega next extends us an invitation, you will find me analyzing the data from our investigation. Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_210<tab>Before they were attacked, Biggs and Wedge discovered a tomestone.
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_211<tab>I shall examine its contents and make the information available on the terminal over there as I extract it. Feel free to refer to it whenever the occasion arises.

TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_212<tab>There's no telling when Omega will summon us, but we must all see that we are ready when it does. Fear not, old friend. We'll get through it together...somehow or other.
